name: Adventure Yes!
description:
Survive through the Dangerous terrains of planet EE772 as Captain A.J.

This game has the following features:

- [Script] Added Enemy Type "Turret" with a friendly variant

-[Script] Final Boss Enemy Type

-[Script] Modified winning condition in the final level (win after killing boss)

-[Art] Completely original player sprite and animation

-[Art] Completely Original Enemy sprites and animation (Walkers, Turrets, and Boss)

-[Art] Completely Original Sprite Tiles

-[Art] Completely Original Platforms (Hands)

-[Art] Completely Original Goal Post

Created By: Faris Turkistani 

Credits:

[Music] 

- Numb by Yung Kurtz https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Yung_Kartz/may-2020/numb

-Fear The Future by Eaters https://freemusicarchive.org/music/eaters/the-astronomers-office/fear-the-future

-Crystal Systems by Eaters https://freemusicarchive.org/music/eaters/watchmaker-untitled/crystal-systems

-Jamaica Jive by Mr.Ruiz https://freemusicarchive.org/music/mrruiz/winter-haze-summer-daze/jamaica-jive

-Background Video: http://forfilmcreation.com/
